articles.summary: Short-term holders offloaded 30.9K BTC to exchanges, taking realized losses worth about $3.3 billion. Persistent negative exchange netflows point to accumulation, reducing supply available for immediate use. $BTC just gave us the setup legends wait for.

articles.title: Crypto industry on the verge of ‘over 100 crypto ETF' swarm, says expert
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: The SEC's approval of new guidelines will open the market for over 100 crypto ETFs to launch, according to James Seyffart of Bloomberg Intelligence. He is an expert on the exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and the crypto market.

articles.title: UK's First Bitcoin Treasury Company B HODL Buys 100 BTC
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: B HODL Plc. has bought 100 Bitcoin for $113,227 each. The purchase marks the start of the company's Bitcoin treasury strategy, totaling $11.3 million with each BTC acquired at an average price of $113.031.

articles.title: XRP Whales Move Billions as Market Rotation Boosts Ripple and TRX Into Best Altcoins to ...
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: In 24 hours, large XRP holders added 30 million coins and shifted over $812 million between wallets. Separate on-chain data revealed a single transfer of 141.8 million XRP worth $2.84 in one of the biggest transactions in history.

articles.title: Investor Alert: PrimeWealth Limited falsely implies CIRO registration (CIRO - Canadian Investment Regulatory Organization)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: PrimeWealth Limited is a fraudulent crypto trading platform operating through the website [primewealthltd[.]com. CIRO is warning investors about PrimeWealth Ltd. September 24, 2025 (Toronto, Ontario) CIRO: Protect yourself against fraudulent schemes.

articles.title: Bitcoin Whale Moves: $3B Accumulated in September as Smart Money Bets on Q4 Rally
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: In September 2025, activity by Bitcoin whales surged. More than $3 billion worth of BTC has been moved through large wallets. A Satoshi-era wallet also sent 1,000 BTC ($116 million) into new wallets ahead of the US Federal Reserve's key interest rate.

articles.title: Slow Progress for Cardano and Dogecoin, While Traders Pivot Aggressively Into Layer Brett
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: The bearish sentiment around Cardano might create whale buying opportunities, but money is almost universally filtering into faster alternatives. Academic blockchain development moves at university pace, while Layer Brett delivers L2 speed that matches much more vibrant energy. Why wait for Cardano? Layer Brett is a better alternative.

articles.title: 'Permanent recognition': GOP lawmakers push for Charlie Kirk likeness on US coins
articles.author: Brendan Rascius
articles.summary: Texas Rep. August Pfluger and Arizona Rep. Abe Hamadeh want to introduce a bill to create 400,000 dollar coins memorializing Charlie Kirk. Kirk was the founder of Turning Point USA and was shot and killed on Sept. 10 while speaking to a large crowd at Utah Valley University. His memorial service was held on September 21.
